gcci.text: H100 supply stabilizes as US-East availability improves, easing capex pressure and lead times.

gtpi.text: Token costs are falling as API price wars intensify and distilled models capture edge workloads.

gagl.text: Nuclear baseload is becoming critical for new GW-scale clusters amid rising grid strain.

aipi.text: Market consolidation signals a maturing AI sector, but sustained growth will depend on diversified demand and cost discipline.
